Welcome!

Published

August 21, 2023

We start our adventure by meeting our learning community, discussing what we going to learn, why should we learn it, and the logistics of how are we going to learn it. We will make sure everyone can use the learning materials, and that it’s clear what is required to succeed in this class.

Learning Objectives

By the end of this lesson, learners will be able to:

  • [1] Start to form community of learners.
  • [2] Navigate the course materials, identify and understand the policies & code of conduct
  • [3] Give an example of the role of data in your life. [CO2e]
  • [4] Create a file organizational strategy, and install software. [CO1e]
Essential Questions

Think about these questions as you engage with the materials in this module. Be prepared to share your responses in class.

Who are we in this class? What do we have in common? What ideas or perspectives do each of us bring? How can you be successful in this class? How does data influence our lives?
